link.synopsis: Vasudev Brahmanand Shastri was devastated by his wife's death, but his faith in reincarnation has kept him calm, knowing he'll one day see her again. In preparation, he attempts to make himself young again using tantric practices. But when his wife reappears before he's ready to have her back, he'll have to think fast as his perfect plan backfires on him. Director Siddharth Randeria also stars in this Gujarati-language comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Once Upon a Time in Mumbai
Som Thi Shukra Taro, Shaniware Hun Maro
Lakhtar Ni Ladi Ne Vilayat No Var

link.synopsis: Amar already gets enough grief from his wife, who doesn't approve of his career as a small-time grocer. But his life becomes all the more complicated when his best friend, Samir, steps in to try and help him and a mysterious woman enters the picture. Tushar Joshi directs this Gujarati-language comedy of errors with a cast that includes Ashish Bhatt, Sanjay Shah, Parag Shah, Manisha Kanojia and Pooja Mehar.
link.title: synopsis
Som Thi Shukra Taro, Shaniware Hun Maro
Lakhtar Ni Ladi Ne Vilayat No Var
Pachhi Kehta Nahi Ke Kahyun Nahotu

link.synopsis: When a gay model is killed, uber-macho cop Sgt. Benson (Ryan O'Neal) and prim, gay police filing clerk Kerwin (John Hurt) must pose as lovers and go undercover in Los Angeles's gay community to investigate the crime. The assignment and their own prejudices drive them both to distraction, until they close in on their quarry and each discovers a newfound respect for the strengths of the other. James Burrows directs this entertaining comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Eating Out: All You Can Eat
Kiss Me Deadly: A Jacob Keane Assignment
Hell Hole / Jungle Virgin Force / Ghost Ninja / Primitives

link.synopsis: When eccentric millionaire T.J. Banner (Gene Lockhart) wills his fortune and his pathetic Brooklyn Loons pro baseball team not to his family but to Rhubarb, his cat, everyone has an axe to grind -- at least until Rhubarb turns out to be a good-luck charm for the Loons. But the team's newfound success thwarts the plans of some gangsters, who then make game plans of their own. Ray Milland and Jan Sterling star in this charming comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Great Wacky Western Comedies: The Wackiest Wagon Train in the West / Fair Play / The Terror of Tiny Town
The Invasion of the Star Creatures / Invasion of the Bee Girls
Oakland A's Vintage World Series Film
When Willie Comes Marching Home / Up the River
Home School: Cat Corner & Furry Friends
The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit
Keep 'Em Flying / Ride 'Em Cowboy / Pardon My Sarong / Who Done It?
Sports Legends Collection: The Joe Louis Story / The Jackie Robinson Story
Francis the Talking Mule / Francis Goes to the Races
Take Me Out to the Ball Game

link.synopsis: Thrill to more than 30 toe-tapping songs with this collection of clips from some of 2007's biggest Bollywood hits. Tracks include "Isq Ka Kalma" and "Billo Rani" from Goal, "Aao Milo Chalo," "Yeh Ishq Hai" and "Mauja Hi Mauja" from the romantic comedy Jab We Met, "Thaare Vaaste" from Shakalaka Boom Boom, "Maria Maria," "Tum Se Hi," "Do U Wanna Partner" and "Dupatta Tera" from Partner and eight songs from the award-winning Om Shanti Om.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: In director Ho-Cheung Pang's black comedy, Sgt. Tsim Kin-Yip (Simon Yam) interrogates Kwan (Nick Cheung), a pervert picked up for peeping in a women's restroom. Kwan claims he was only there to gather evidence about a secret clan of women conspiring to rid the world of men. The detective dismisses Kwan's wild story as the paranoid ravings of a lunatic, until mounting evidence to the contrary becomes too difficult to ignore.
link.title: synopsis
Fox Volant of the Snowy Mountain
Revenge of the Kung Fu Master
Kung Fu Mahjong 3: The Final Duel

link.synopsis: Actor Seth Packard writes, directs and stars in this charming indie comedy as a wannabe Don Juan-type named Ethan, whose designs to woo the beautiful Madison (Shay Williamson) are jeopardized when his bullish brother, Clay (Matthew Webb), gets involved. If that doesn't complicate things enough, Ethan's cousin Cleo (Lauren McKnight) decides that she and Ethan should be more than mere blood relatives. What's a guy to do?
link.title: synopsis
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date

link.synopsis: Tyrone Power stars in two versions of the same romantic comedy -- 1937's Love Is News, and the 1948 remake, That Wonderful Urge -- as a journalist who earns his dough by reporting on the lives of the rich and famous. But when a wealthy heiress who often appears in his column enacts her revenge by announcing they're secretly engaged, he suddenly becomes the target of unwanted media attention. Loretta Young and Gene Tierney co-star.
link.title: synopsis
The Doctor Takes a Wife / A Night to Remember
Four Men and a Prayer / Seas Beneath
Deanna Durbin: Three Smart Girls / Something in the Wind
Here Comes Cookie / Love in Bloom / Six of a Kind: Triple Feature
Rhythm on the Range / Rhythm on the River: Double Feature
I Met Him in Paris / Bluebeard's Eighth Wife

title.regular: That Wonderful Urge / Love Is News
title.short: That Wonderful Urge / Love Is News

link.synopsis: In this sequel to the hit teen comedy, longtime friends and now roommates Manuel (Bruno Ascenzo), Efrain (Oscar Beltrán) and El Gordo (José Manuel Peláez) celebrate the end of summer with a party to rival the wild bash they threw four years ago. But are they ready for an unexpected guest? When call girl Viviana (Melania Urbina) returns, the guys lives are turned upside down as they face some tough decisions.
link.title: synopsis
Vidas Privadas / Pantaleon Y Las Visitadores
Donde Quedo La Abuela? El Viaje De La Nonna
Dios los Junta y Ellos Se Separan

link.synopsis: James Lima's satirical comedy stars Cathleen Gallagher as Casey McCann, a supermodel who seems to have it all: a successful career, an opulent lifestyle, a well-heeled boyfriend -- and a mysterious stalker. Determined to find out who's been breaking into her apartment, Casey sets up a hidden video camera in her bedroom, hoping to catch the pervy perp in action. Soupy Sales and Moon Unit Zappa co-star.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Beloved sitcom star Harry Anderson plays Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist Dave Barry (a series contributing writer), who is forever balancing his child-of-the-'60s idealism with his suburban-dad-of-the-'90s reality in this warm and witty comedy. The cast includes DeLane Matthews as Dave's more-responsible spouse and Shadoe Stevens as Dave's editor and best friend. Florence Henderson and Pat Morita guest star.
link.title: synopsis
Andy Richter Controls the Universe: The Complete Series
Spin City: Michael J. Fox: His All-Time Favorites: Vol. 1
The Thin Blue Line: The Complete Lineup
The Adventures of Brisco County, Jr.: The Complete Series
The Funny World of Lucy: Vol. 2
Knowing Me Knowing You with Alan Partridge: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: In a hilarious one-hour set, comedian Jimmy Dore takes on the Clinton sex scandal, reflects on watching Christian talk shows while high, explains his paranoia about the Gap, and offers a novel solution to fighting Al Qaeda. The Comedy Central star and writer of the off-Broadway hit "The Marijuana-logues" has carved out a solid reputation as a funnyman with an unassuming yet energetic style and a keen sense of humor that keeps audiences roaring.
link.title: synopsis
Patton Oswalt: My Weakness Is Strong
Joe Rogan: Talking Monkeys in Space
Mike Birbiglia: What I Should Have Said Was Nothing: Tales From My Secret Public Journal
Space: Above and Beyond: The Complete Series
Russell Brand in New York City
Kevin Downey Jr.: I'm Not Gay, But Don't Stop
Dane Cook: Rough Around the Edges: Live from Madison Square Garden
Charlie Murphy: I Will Not Apologize
Outlaugh: The Best of Queer Comedy
Gabriel Iglesias: I'm Not Fat ... I'm Fluffy
Comedy Jump Off: The Latino Connection
Katt Williams: The Pimp Chronicles: Pt. 1

link.synopsis: Magazine editor Sam Briggs (Kyle Bornheimer) wants to tie the knot with his pregnant girlfriend, Melanie (Erinn Hayes). The only obstacle is winning the approval of her conservative parents (Kurtwood Smith and Nancy Lenehan). But no matter what Sam does, his bumbling nature makes impressing them nearly impossible. Jay Malone and Tamara Mello co-star in this comedy based on the British hit "The Worst Week of My Life."
link.title: synopsis
Worst Week: The Complete Series: Disc 1
Worst Week: The Complete Series: Disc 2
The Worst Week of My Life
My Own Worst Enemy: The Complete Series

Saturday Night Live: The Best of Adam Sandler
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Chris Farley
The Vicar of Dibley: 10th Anniversary Specials

link.synopsis: Lil JJ, the multitalented star of Nickelodeon's hit sitcom "Just Jordan" and former host of "Friday Night Slimetime," thrills a packed house with a mix of acting, rapping, dancing and stand-up comedy, all aimed at the "almost-grown" audience. Lil JJ presides over a fun night, which also features performances by teen rappers Lil Tre and nNocent, underground U.K. hip-hop artist Life, and the Almost Grown Dancers.

Bobby Jones: Comedy All Stars: Vol. 1

title.short: Lil JJ's Almost Grown: Variety Show

link.synopsis: Afraid to move out of his parents' New Jersey house and marry his longtime girlfriend, Susan (Stacie Mistysyn), nursing home employee Jack (Steve Parlavecchio) meets a glamorous model (Jill Wolfe) while visiting exotic Manhattan and embarks on an unlikely affair. Caught between the glitz of the Big Apple and the stability of the Garden State, our Jersey guy must make a life-changing choice in this charming indie comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human
Smiling Fish and Goat on Fire

link.synopsis: Connoisseurs of classic comedy will relish the pratfall-filled antics contained in this exhaustive collection, which features the work of such luminaries as Charlie Chaplin, Harold Lloyd, Stan Laurel and Hal Roach. Films include "Luke Joins the Navy," "By the Sad Sea Waves," "Dodge Your Debts," "Looking for Trouble," "Whirl o' the West," "The Dippy Dentist," "Charley's Aunt," "Kid Speed" and the talkie "Playboy Number One."
link.title: synopsis
Slapstick Symposium: The Stan Laurel Collection: Vol. 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Oliver Hardy Collection
The Little Tramp: The Charlie Chaplin Collection
Sgt. Bilko: The Phil Silvers Show: Season 1
Martin Scorsese Presents: The Blues: A Musical Journey
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection 2
Kings of Comedy: Masters of the Silent Screen
The Laurel & Hardy Collection: Vol. 2: Alone and Together
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 3
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
Laurel & Hardy: Be Big / A Lucky Dog

link.synopsis: Tag along with spirited 15-year-old Eva (Dorota Grzelak) as she makes the world a better place all on her own. This charming comedy follows the Polish girl's fun adventures in which she uses her energy, intellect and determination to right wrongs wherever she goes. Adapted from a popular series of books by author Kornel Makuszynski, this memorable family film will entertain viewers of all ages and touch their hearts.
link.title: synopsis
Jak Rozpetalem II Wojne Swiatowa I
Deanna Durbin: Three Smart Girls / Something in the Wind
A Year of the Quiet Sun
On the Banks of the Niemen
Between the Cup and the Lip
Co Mi Zrobisz Jak Mnie Zlapiesz

link.synopsis: The first in a series of films based on Giovanni Guareschi's popular books, this film stars French comedian Fernandel as Don Camillo, a Catholic priest who is at odds with his rural village's newly elected Communist mayor, Peppone (Gino Cervi). This joint production between France and Italy transcends its own identity as a comedy, making a historically relevant commentary about Italy's controversial postwar politics and policies.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: While working in her mother's music store, aspiring musician Ally (Nina Dobrev) finds a kindred spirit in Joey (Rob Mayes), the mall's custodian and a budding rock star. The friends encourage each other's musical dreams until  the mall owner's snarky daughter butts in. Now, the pair must find a way to save the music store and realize their own aspirations. Shawn Ku directs this musical romantic comedy co-starring Autumn Reeser.
link.title: synopsis
Jack and Jill vs. the World
10 Things I Hate About You: Vol. 1
I Could Never Be Your Woman

link.synopsis: Becoming the greatest stuntman in his country is the inspired goal of a crackpot New Zealand daredevil in this twisted comedy that's loaded to the gills with stunts, gore and general mayhem. Randy Campbell (director Chris Stapp) is the fearless lad who hails from a family of failed (and very dead) stuntmen. With the "help" of stunt coordinator Dick Johansonson (Matt Heath), Randy prepares to make the ultimate jump in a rocket car.
link.title: synopsis
Bam Margera Presents: Where the #$&% is Santa?
WWE: Legends of Wrestling: Ric Flair & Sgt. Slaughter
Jackie "The Joke Man" Martling: A Safe Distance From Genius
Hart & Soul: The Hart Family Anthology
Bring It On: In It to Win It
Bring It On: All or Nothing

title.regular: Dick: The Devil Dared Me To
title.short: Dick: The Devil Dared Me To

link.synopsis: TV producer Warren (Isaak James) is developing his masterpiece, a reality show called "Handicaps" starring a variety of people with disabilities. Aided by Laura (Eva James), an overbearing partner with anger issues, and an ex-prison guard (Michael C. Kricfalusi), Warren creates a hit. But he soon learns that his cast can be just as vain and egotistical as anyone else in Hollywood. James also wrote and directed this politically incorrect comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Heroes for Sale / Wild Boys of the Road
Spike and Mike's Sick & Twisted Festival of Animation

Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story

Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back

link.synopsis: In this popular British series that's part cooking show, part travelogue and part comedy, Jennifer Paterson and Clarissa Dickson-Wright cook up a storm as they crisscross the English countryside on a classic Triumph motorcycle and sidecar. The larger-than-life duo encourages people to enjoy the moment with rich and satisfying recipes that are anything but heart-friendly, washing the meals down with outrageous tales of their past misadventures.
link.title: synopsis

Two Fat Ladies: The Complete Collection: Disc 2

title.short: Two Fat Ladies: The Complete Collection

link.synopsis: Teresa Kennedy (Angell Conwell) has everything going for her: looks, brains, success and a great sense of humor. So why can't she find the right man? Her friends are a little too eager to help, introducing Teresa to men they think she'll love. But Teresa's waiting for a little direction from above before she decides on her perfect guy. Marcello Thedford and Tommy Chunn co-star in this faith-based romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Keepin' the Faith: My Baby's Gettin' Married!
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Soul Theater Series: The Fabric of a Man
Tyler Perry's I Can Do Bad All by Myself
I Think I Love My Wife

title.regular: Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right
title.short: Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right

link.synopsis: Three flatmates -- rocker-dominatrix A.K. (Eugene Hutz, of the Gypsy punk band Gogol Bordello), ballet dancer-stripper Holly (Holly Weston) and pharmacist Juliette (Vicky McClure) -- chase their dreams of glory in contemporary London. Madonna, who makes her directorial debut, squeezes in a couple of her own tunes in this sprawling urban comedy, which premiered at the Berlin International Film Festival in 2008.
link.title: synopsis
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story
Coma Girl: The State of Grace

link.synopsis: Forced at gunpoint to marry feisty pioneer Mary Stuart Cherne (Eleanor Parker), 18th-century trapper Bushrod Gentry (Robert Taylor) escapes the trap of matrimony by fleeing to the North Country -- but his new bride is hot on his trail. Throughout their journey, Bushrod and Mary take turns rescuing each other from the continual threat of Indians. This rollicking comedy disguised as a frontier adventure also stars Victor McLaglen as Mary's father.
link.title: synopsis
Clark Gable Collection: The Tall Men
Showtime USA: Kentucky Jubilee / The Kid from Gower Gulch
The Man with the Golden Arm: 50th Anniversary Special Edition

link.synopsis: After striking out with the beautiful Marie, Hiroshi builds an android identical to his dream girl. But when he tries to get his new "sister" to tell Marie what a great guy he is, the robot develops feelings of her own. Hiroshi's master plan turns out to be a farcical comedy of errors in this charming animated series, an anime hybrid of Frankenstein and Pygmalion, based on the manga comic books by Sakura Takeuchi.
link.title: synopsis
All Purpose Cultural Cat Girl Nuku Nuku Dash
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 1: The Aroused One
Full Metal Panic: The Second Raid

link.synopsis: Crushed to discover that the love of his life is engaged to another man, an oil well digger (William Eythe) will do anything to win her back, including trying to impress her by performing dangerous high-profile stunts out in the oil field. But will his monkeyshines get him the girl -- or a broken neck? Frank McDonald directs this comedy also featuring Barbara Britton and Ian MacDonald.
link.title: synopsis
Serial Box: Vol. 1: Radar Men from the Moon
I Was a Male War Bride
Deanna Durbin: It Started with Eve / Can't Help Singing
One Night in the Tropics / Buck Privates / In the Navy / Hold That Ghost
Gene Autry Collection: The Big Sombrero

link.synopsis: When college freshman Marco (Nestor Cantillana) arrives home at Easter with his girlfriend, Sofia (Patricia Lopez), the weekend starts off well, and Sofia captivates everyone. But things begin to go awry as her darker self emerges in this black comedy from Chile. Revealing her seductive side, tempting Marco's father and offering drugs to some of Marco's friends who've joined the gathering, Sofia turns the holiday into a family fiasco.
link.title: synopsis
WWE: The History of the Intercontinental Championship
French & Saunders: Gentlemen Prefer French & Saunders
Cuentos De Hadas Para Dormir Cocodrilos
To the Left of the Father
The Beat That My Heart Skipped

link.synopsis: While shopping at Earl's All American Exquisite Antique-O-Rama, Brad and Cat decide to buy a mummy. But what begins as a joke quickly unravels in this crazy horror spoof starring J. Todd Anderson, Adam Rihacek and Natasha Randall. The visually striking comedy marks the sophomore feature of writer-director Anderson, the longtime storyboard artist and visual consultant for the Coen brothers.
link.title: synopsis
Tedeum / Revenge of Trinty / Viva Django / Blackie the Pirate
Einstein: The Real Story of the Man Behind the Theory
Film Crew: Wild Women of Wongo
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Chesterfield Kings: Where is the Chesterfield King?

link.synopsis: Aptly nicknamed "Jack the Dog" for his womanizing ways, married photographer Jack (Nestor Carbonell) spends much of his time trying to hide his affairs from his wife, Faith (Barbara Williams), who finally gets fed up and walks out on him. Forced to face his faults while raising his young son, Sam (Andrew J. Ferchland), alone, Jack soon learns some important life lessons in this moving indie comedy.
link.title: synopsis
King of the Cage: Cage Girls: Vol. 1
WWE: Allied Powers: The World's Greatest Tag Teams
Donald and Dot Clock Found Dead in Their Home
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human
Smiling Fish and Goat on Fire

link.synopsis: After Arun (Salman Khan) curses God for causing misfortune, the Almighty (Amitabh Bachchan) appears to him and grants him unlimited powers for one week. Rather than making the world a better place, Arun angers God by using his incredible gift to make himself happy instead. A remake of the American movie Bruce Almighty, this Bollywood comedy co-stars Priyanka Chopra as the object of Arun's affections.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: When family patriarch Moishe (Sergio Kleiner) drops dead, his disgruntled friends and relatives meet to sit shivah, a Jewish mourning ritual. As family members complain about the deceased, two angels (Enrique Cimet and Max Kerlow) evaluate Moishe's life to determine the fate of his soul. Writer-director Alejandro Springall crafts a colorful parade of absurdly eccentric characters in this ribald Mexican comedy, which opened the 2007 New York Jewish Film Festival.
link.title: synopsis
Donde Quedo La Abuela? El Viaje De La Nonna
Turn Left at the End of the World
The Year My Parents Went on Vacation
Dios los Junta y Ellos Se Separan

link.synopsis: Kay Francis, Martha Raye, Carole Landis and Mitzi Mayfair star as themselves -- with legendary comic Phil Silvers as their Army escort, Eddie -- in this delightful 1944 musical, based on Landis's book about entertaining the troops on a USO tour. With a touch of comedy and romance to spice things up, this fun film features appearances by Alice Faye, Carmen Miranda, Betty Grable and the Jimmy Dorsey Orchestra.
link.title: synopsis
Keep 'Em Flying / Ride 'Em Cowboy / Pardon My Sarong / Who Done It?
My Favorite Blonde / Star Spangled Rhythm
Juke Joint / Reet, Petite and Gone

link.synopsis: In a film inspired by early Hollywood history, silent film director Mike Connors (Don Ameche) discovers struggling actress Molly Hayden (Alice Faye) and turns her into a slapstick comedy star, inventing the pie fight in the process. After making several hits together, they drift apart when Mike tries his hand at historical dramas. When a tragedy reunites them, Mike asks Molly to star in his comeback film, a talkie.
link.title: synopsis
Deanna Durbin: It Started with Eve / Can't Help Singing

link.synopsis: A blast from the past threatens to destroy the opportunity of a lifetime for a music producer on the rise in this urban comedy about rags, riches and the record business. Pure Water (Diezzle Don) can't believe his luck when a powerful record exec offers him the chance to lay down a demo track at his swanky mansion. But how can he possibly stay on track when a friend who was recently released from prison (Jermaine Hopkins) shows up to party down?

Capone 'N' Noriega: What Up 2 Da Hood
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man

title.regular: I Wish I Had a House Like This
title.short: I Wish I Had a House Like This

link.synopsis: The women of an urban congregation come calling to collect when the recently widowed Rev. Grady Griffin puts himself back on the market in this independent comedy from Rodney L. Clark, based on his touring gospel play by the same name. Mary Riggins, Brenda Thompson, Damon Ervin, Jerome Stevenson, Hester Dean and Sheila Asberry-Clark co-star, along with several vocalists who reprise their roles from the original production.
link.title: synopsis
Keepin' the Faith: My Baby's Gettin' Married!
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail

link.synopsis: Writer-director Darryl Roberts also co-stars in this slice-of-life comedy set in 1990s Chicago, the story of a young black couple who find they don't share common values when it comes to ambition. Thomas (Darnell Williams) is content to stay where he is by sticking to the status quo, but the social-climbing Valerie (Salli Richardson) wants so much more out of life. Can they find a way to make things work together, or are they better off apart?
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: With his eye on making a name for himself as a rapper, Donzelli Waters (Brian Hooks) drags his best friends (Kent Masters King and Sticky Fingaz) to Malibu to crash the Boogie Beach Bash, where they're surrounded by women of every sort -- and have a hard time staying on task. Real-life rapper E-40 and "Baywatch" regular Traci Bingham guest star as themselves in this straight-to-video hip-hop comedy.
link.title: synopsis
My Big Phat Hip Hop Family
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
Bucky Larson: Born to be a Star
National Lampoon Presents Jake's Booty Call

link.synopsis: Determined to defeat a formidable foe, a young martial arts student (Casanova Wong) looks to a wise old sage (Simon Yuen) for guidance. Of course, the fact that his mentor exhibits equal expertise in drinking wine only adds to the fun. Jackie Chan and Pan Pan Yeung co-star in this kung fu classic -- also known as The Story of Drunken Master -- that blends elements of fast-paced action and physical comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Half a Loaf of Kung Fu
Operation Condor 2: Armour of the Gods
Jackie Chan: The Kung Fu Years / Force 5 / The Power of Aikido / Dr. Wai
Deadly Snail vs. Kung Fu Killer
Crash Masters: The Dragon, the Hero

link.synopsis: Rudy Ray Moore -- an underground comedian and blaxploitation star of the 1960s and '70s -- revisits his other career as an R&B singer in this 2000 concert filmed live at New York City's Wetlands and featuring special guest Jimmy "Funky Tramp" Lynch. The raucous set list blends Moore's infamous foulmouthed comedy with songs such as "Hully Gully Fever," "Hip Shakin' Papa," "Put Me in the Mix" and "Do You Call That a Buddy?"
link.title: synopsis
R. Kelly: Trapped in the Closet: Chapters 13-22
Love Train: The Sound of Philadelphia: Live in Concert
We Don't Die, We Multiply: The Robin Harris Story
Kiss and Tail: The Hollywood Jump-Off
NBA Ultimate Jordan: 20th Anniversary Collector's Edition
En Vogue: Live in the USA
Michael Jackson: Fan's Camera Footage, By Fans for Fans
Quincy Jones: The 75th Birthday Celebration: Live at Montreux 2008
Ray Charles: The Legend Lives On
Boyz II Men: Motown: A Journey Through Hitsville USA: Live
Solomon Burke: The King Live at Avo Session Basel
Dreams to Remember: The Legacy of Otis Redding
Damita Jo: The Lady Is a Tramp
Let the Music Play: The Barry White Story
The Temptations Review with Dennis Edwards
Ray, Goodman & Brown: Live in Concert
Live from the Rock 'n' Roll Palace: Vol. 3
The Temptations: Get Ready: Definitive Performances 1965-1972
Marvin Gaye: What's Going On: The Life & Death of Marvin Gaye
Most Famous Hits: James Brown - Live at Chastain Park

title.regular: Rudy Ray Moore: Live at Wetlands: N.Y.C.
title.short: Rudy Ray Moore: Live at Wetlands: N.Y.C.

link.synopsis: Jagoda (Branka Katic), who works the checkout stand at the local supermarket, is disillusioned with her love life. In her funk, she's ends up offending a perfectly kind elderly woman. All sanity lets loose when Marko, the war veteran grandson (Srdjan Todorovic), shows up to seek vengeance. The workers are taken hostage, the SWAT team intervenes, and Jagoda and Marko form an unusual bond. Dusan Milic directs this quirky romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
When Father Was Away on Business
Bloodied but Unbowed: Bloodshot Records' Life in the Trenches
71 Fragments of a Chronology of Chance
A Long Weekend in Pest and Buda
The Other Side of the Bed

link.synopsis: The lives of a do-it-yourself pornographer, a single-minded assassin and her gay hairdresser son collide in this outlandish comedy. Looking to make a fast buck, filmmaker Quentin (Richard Allom Cosgrove) tries to persuade his gal pal to star in his upcoming skin flick. Meanwhile, hairstylist Nigel (David Sheard) helps his mob enforcer mom (Janice Gray) execute a contract, putting them on a collision course with Quentin when the hit goes awry.
link.title: synopsis
A Film with Me in It
Glick Doesn't Do Red Carpet: Jiminy Glick at the Independent Spirit Awards
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story

link.synopsis: Danny (Joe Tyler Gold) pursues his ex-girlfriend (Ilana Turner) to Hollywood, where she's an aspiring actress. When he finds her at an audition for Macbeth, he's unaware that superstition forbids mentioning the play's title. With one utterance, Danny's life starts falling apart. He's a rational science teacher who doesn't believe in curses, but recent events begin changing his mind. Gold also wrote this quirky comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Homicide: Life on the Street: Season 4
Hamlet by Brook / Brook by Brook
The Dick Cavett Show: Hollywood Greats
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story
The Complete Works of William Shakespeare (Abridged)

link.synopsis: Single mother Luz (Cherry Pie Picache) has her hands full keeping her three sons Oscar (Polo Ravales), Orson (John Prats), and Orwell (Jiro Manio) happy in this Filipino comedy. As Oscar and Orson deal with their homosexuality in different ways, Orwell tries to figure out his own identity. Add a baby and jealous lovers to the mix, and you have the trademark madness of Manay Po. Christian Vasquez co-stars as Luz's boyfriend, Gerry.
link.title: synopsis
Otto; or, Up With Dead People

link.synopsis: Metrosexual jologs (or country bumpkins) Joven, Rodel and Cris move to Manila to make it in the big city in this comedy that pokes fun at modern Filipino society. At odds with almost everyone they meet, the outsiders struggle to fit in no matter how hard they try. Luckily their gay hairdresser Vitarich is there to dole out pearls of wisdom. Paolo Ballesteros, Tyron Perez and Marky Lopez star as the "metlogs."
link.title: synopsis
Understatement: The Bench Underwear & Denim Fashion Show
Shaw Martial Arts Legends: Guns of Master Killer / Raiders of Buddhist Kung-Fu
Judy Ann & Ryan 2-in-1: Rosaryo / Inday Bote
Enteng Kabisote 3: Okay Ka Fairy Ko
All About Love: Ang Sarap Ma-In Love

link.synopsis: Fitting in at his new high school is tough for Harold (Spencer Breslin), especially since he suffers from early male-pattern baldness. With mean classmates making his life miserable, Harold tries to turn his luck around by taking the advice of a caring janitor (Cuba Gooding Jr.). Co-starring Ally Sheedy, Nikki Blonsky and Chris Parnell, this delightful comedy cleverly depicts the harsh realities of being an outsider.
link.title: synopsis
The Year My Parents Went on Vacation
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell
Bring It On: All or Nothing

link.synopsis: The mysterious KK Jaiswal (Prem Chopra) summons six strangers to a resort where they find out that he plans to pass on his industrial empire. But they quickly learn the company is in debt, and they must work together to keep it afloat in this Bollywood comedy. Their efforts are nearly foiled by the tycoon's nephew, Parag (Ravi Kishan), who considers himself the rightful heir and will do whatever it takes to get rid of his competitors.
link.title: synopsis
Paap Ko Jalaakar Raakh Kar Doonga
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta

link.synopsis: Italian baroque composer Stefano Landi's landmark historical opera about the inner life of fifth-century Saint Alexius receives an elaborate and fearless production featuring conductor William Christie and an all-male cast. Combining history, comedy and an innovative blend of musical styles, Landi's popular opera includes stellar performances by sopranist countertenors Philippe Jaroussky and Max Emmanuel Cencic.
link.title: synopsis
Verdi: The Royal Opera: Covent Garden: Don Carlos
Anne-Sophie Mutter: The Mozart Violin Sonatas
Samson et Dalila: The Royal Opera
Anna Netrebko: Mozart: Le Nozze di Figaro
Natalie Dessay: Greatest Moments on Stage
La Traviata: Love & Sacrifice: The Story of the Opera
Opera Australia: Celebration: 40 Years Of Australian Opera
Georges Bizet: Les Pecheurs De Perles
Cook, Dixon & Young: In Concert: Vol. 1
The Art of Singing: Golden Voices of the Century
Russell Watson: Live in New Zealand
Henze: L'Upupa Und Der Triumph Der Sohnesliebe

link.synopsis: This classic musical tale centers on the topsy-turvy West Coast trip of an aspiring singer-saxophonist (Dick Powell) who seizes upon a golden opportunity and unwittingly lands himself in the middle of a backstage controversy involving a Hollywood starlet. Directed by the great Busby Berkeley, the energetic comedy is perhaps best known for the toe-tapping performances by Benny Goodman and his legendary swing band.
link.title: synopsis
The Big Broadcast of 1938 / College Swing
A Hard Day's Night: Collector's Series
There's No Business Like Show Business

link.synopsis: Colby (Mathew Botuchis), a teen wannabe entrepreneur, creates an Internet sensation when he secretly places webcams around his family's home and broadcasts their real-life exploits online. But when his family finds out, will their lust for fame ruin his enterprise? Beau Bridges, Rosanna Arquette, Hector Elizondo, Dan Castellaneta, Doris Roberts and Shiri Appleby also star in this irreverent comedy from director Eric Steven Stahl.
link.title: synopsis
The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down
How to Make Love to a Woman
The Night of the White Pants

link.synopsis: After getting ditched by his fiancée (Lauren Kim), despondent Jim Lee (James Kyson Lee) exhorts his longtime pal Alex (Kirt Kishita) -- a hit man -- to put him out of his misery before Valentine's Day. But while searching for a mountainside funeral site scant days before his scheduled death, Jim falls in love again in this off-the-wall indie comedy. The supporting cast includes Kathy Uyen.
link.title: synopsis
Slant: Asian American Short Films: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: Despite the odds against them -- and the disapproval of friends and family -- two lovers (John O. Nelson and Dilshad Vadsaria) try to keep their relationship strong amid the challenges of raising a child, getting an education and holding steady jobs. Crystal Cotton, Kira Baskerville, Jarvia Udosen, Rodney Owens and Shanice Dowridge also star in this indie romantic comedy from director Willis L. Petrie.
link.title: synopsis
What Kind of Love Is This?
Don't Touch If You Ain't Prayed
Pastor Jones 2: Help Save My Daughter
Three Ways to Get a Husband
A Good Day to Be Black & Sexy
What a Man Wants, What a Woman Needs
Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
A Good Man Is Hard to Find

link.synopsis: William Woodman directs this faithful adaptation of Shakespeare's comedy, which stars award-winning actor Efrem Zimbalist Jr. as Prospero, the magician and former Duke of Milan who spends 12 years stranded on an island with his daughter, Miranda (J.E. Taylor). Staged and costumed in the tradition of the original Globe Theatre performances, this noteworthy production also stars William H. Bassett, Ted Sorel, Ron Palillo and William Hootkins.
link.title: synopsis
Shakespeare Comedies: The Taming of the Shrew
Shakespeare Comedies: A Midsummer Night's Dream
Shakespeare Comedies: As You Like It
Shakespeare Comedies: The Merchant of Venice
Broadway Theatre Archive: Out of Our Fathers' House
Martha Graham: An American Original in Performance

link.synopsis: After a bank robbery is botched by his elderly accomplice's untimely death, young Iñaki flees Spain for Mexico, where he plans to lay low for a while with his father and his friend, Caimán. But soon, Caimán ropes the boy into attempting another heist. Meanwhile, the drag-queen uncle of Iñaki's girlfriend harbors hopes that the young man will get on the straight and narrow. Beto Gómez directs this award-winning dark comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Once Upon a Time in Rio
P.D. James: A Taste for Death

link.synopsis: When a middle-aged accountant (Enrique Pinti) decides to chuck his humdrum life and go on the lam in search of liberation, he soon discovers that his family's frantic search for him becomes fodder for a new kind of reality television show. Now, his personal quest for excitement and a fresh existence has become hilarious top-rated entertainment for his entire country. Carmen Maura co-stars in this delightful comedy.
link.title: synopsis
How to be a Woman and not Die in the Attempt

link.synopsis: Kati Outinen stars in this minimalistic black comedy from acclaimed director Aki Kaurismäki as Iris, a plain-Jane match factory worker desperate to escape her overbearing parents and dreary, uneventful life. When she discovers that her first fun night in ages has resulted in a dreadfully unwanted pregnancy, Iris decides that the time has come to exact a little revenge -- against anyone who dares to cross her.
link.title: synopsis
Lakki: The Boy Who Could Fly

link.synopsis: As memories of 2000 and 2004 grow dimmer, this documentary reminds viewers of the controversy surrounding the elections of George W. Bush. Filmmaker Dorothy Fadiman uses film clips and interviews to make the strong case that Bush won neither contest. Voters, election officials and politicos discuss their efforts to expose the truth, while media footage -- including some spot-on calls from Comedy Central -- recalls the events at the time.
link.title: synopsis
The Speeches Collection: Vol. 2: Republicans vs. Democrats
High: The True Tale of American Marijuana
Jimmy Carter: The President from Plains
The Greatest Speeches of All Time: Vol. 3
The Best Government Money Can Buy?
NBC News Presents: The Long War
Death in the Air: Globalism, Terrorism & Toxic Warfare
One Woman, One Vote: American Experience
Two Days in October: American Experience
Kofi Annan: Center of the Storm
The Trojan Horse / Israel and The War of Images

link.synopsis: The lives of six young people, including Argentinean star Gaston Pauls as himself, intertwine over the course of one Saturday in a barren section of Buenos Aires. Meditations on fate, fear and love ensue in this chatty, low-key offbeat comedy -- part of the Argentinean new wave -- by writer-director Juan Villegas, who won the Best First Feature award at the Sarajevo Film Festival in 2002. Daniel Hendler co-stars.
link.title: synopsis
François Ozon: A Curtain Raiser & Other Shorts
No Dejare Que No Me Quieras

link.synopsis: One of Hollywood's greatest comedy teams stars in this collection of features and short films. The career-spanning mix includes the pair's first appearance together (1921's "The Lucky Dog") and their last (the 1951 feature Utopia). Other highlights include "Mud and Sand," "The Slippery Pearls" (co-starring Buster Keaton), "West of Hot Dog," "Wandering Papas" and a rare compilation of home movies shot during the duo's nationwide stage tour.
link.title: synopsis
Laurel & Hardy: Air Raid Wardens / Nothing But Trouble
The Laurel & Hardy Collection: Vol. 2: Alone and Together
Slapstick Symposium: The Stan Laurel Collection: Vol. 2
Laurel & Hardy: March of the Wooden Soldiers
Three Stooges: Stooges and the Law
The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle: Vol. 1
The Best of the Abbott and Costello Comedy Hour
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
Laurel & Hardy: Be Big / A Lucky Dog
Slapstick Symposium: The Charley Chase Collection 2
Laurel & Hardy: This Is Your Life / Laurel & Hardy at the Movies
Slapstick Symposium: The Oliver Hardy Collection
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection
Why Change Your Wife? / Miss Lulu Bett
The Passion of Joan of Arc

link.synopsis: When the Admiralty assigns bumbling Lt. Fairweather (David Tomlinson) to command the dilapidated old HMS Berkeley, the harebrained officer discovers that the ship's crew, led by CPO Doherty (Peter Sellers), has been happily employed in racketeering with some local landlubbers. Officer and crew soon reach a mutually convenient arrangement, at least until Fairweather's superior officers show up for an inspection. Val Guest directs this comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Wrong Arm of the Law
The Golden Years of British Comedy
The Return of the Pink Panther
The Pure Hell of St. Trinian's
Quackser Fortune Has a Cousin in the Bronx
The Teahouse of the August Moon
Chamber of Horrors / The Brides of Fu Manchu
I Love You, Alice B. Toklas!
Good Soldier Schweik 2: Beg to Report, Sir

link.synopsis: This four-episode collection from one of television's earliest variety shows features host and vaudeville comedy legend Ed Wynn hamming it up with fellow funnymen Buddy Ebsen and the Three Stooges. Gloria Swanson and other Hollywood luminaries also appear on Wynn's Emmy-winning show for a variety of gags and sketches, including Vera Vague playing a castaway on an island with a lovelorn gorilla.
link.title: synopsis
The Life of Riley / Our Miss Brooks
Marx Brothers: "You Bet Your Life" Pilot
Sid Caesar Collection: The Buried Treasures
The Dick Cavett Show: Comic Legends
Don't Change Your Husband / The Golden Chance
Not On Your Nellie: The Complete First Series
Don't Touch That Dial: TV's Best Commercials
Naked City: Spectre of the Roses Street Gang
The Three Stooges 75th Anniversary Edition: Tales from the Three Stooges Vol. 1
Edward R. Murrow: The Best of Person to Person
Francis the Talking Mule / Francis Goes to the Races
The George Burns & Gracie Allen Show
Martin & Lewis: Colgate Comedy Hour VII / At the Movies with Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis
Martin & Lewis: Colgate Comedy Hour V & VI
Martin & Lewis: Colgate Comedy Hour III & IV
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 3: Still Laughing
Bob Hope: Bob Hope on TV
Abbott & Costello: Police Rookies / A Tale of Two Kitties / Mail Call / Abbott & Costello at the Movies
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 2: When Television Was Funny
Soupy Sales: In Living Black & White
The Best of the Flip Wilson Show
The Carol Burnett Show: Let's Bump Up the Lights!
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Saturday Night Live: Live from New York: The First 5 Years

link.synopsis: Murdered because he refused to sell his land to a greedy opportunist, Bucko Cassidy (Lee Majors) returns as a ghost to help his grown son, Junior (Derek Hamilton), keep the homestead in the family. While contending with conflicts in his marriage to Ellie (Rachel Wilson), Junior also has to convince everyone around him that he's not crazy -- because he's the only one who can see Bucko. Barry Corbin costars in this quirky comedy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this genre-bending miniseries, small-town Jenny (Natalie Lisinska) takes a job as a chambermaid at the Château Rousseau, where she's greeted with a poolside murder that challenges the skills of detective Michael Quenton (Benz Antoine). A quirky hybrid of comedy, drama, mystery and musical, the program co-stars Martha Henry as Lucy Knowlton, the booze- and drug-addicted hotel owner who presides over an odd brood of artistically inclined guests.
link.title: synopsis
The Ten Commandments: The Greatest Spectacle Ever Told
L5: First City in Space: IMAX
The Catherine Cookson Anthology: The Tide of Life
Karol: A Man Who Became Pope
Category 7: The End of the World
To the Ends of the Earth
When We Left Earth: The NASA Missions

link.synopsis: Romeo (voiced by Saif Ali Khan) has been pampered his entire life, but that all ends when he's abandoned on the tough streets of Mumbai. Now, this spoiled pooch will discover whether he's got what it takes to survive in the real world. In the course of his adventures, he falls in love with Laila (Kareena Kapoor) and runs afoul of bully Charlie Anna (Javed Jaffrey). This landmark comedy is the first major animated Bollywood film.
link.title: synopsis
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: A camping trip goes very wrong when five college students are kidnapped by a secret cult that plans to sacrifice them to a mysterious hairy beast called the Yeti -- who turns out to harbor a deep attraction to young men --  in this raunchy comedy. The situation starts to improve when one of the victims begins to examine his own desires and finds that the Yeti doesn't seem so unappealing -- but can the group escape from the crazed cult members?
link.title: synopsis
Yeti: Curse of the Snow Demon
Coons! Night of the Bandits of the Night
The Decline of the American Empire
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry

link.synopsis: When his Aunt Fema dies and wills him a new church building, Pastor Marcus thinks it's an answer to prayer. The hitch? His aunt also stipulated that he must get his wayward cousins and other kin to attend his church for a month of Sundays. Now, he'll have to find a way to wrangle, cajole and prod his reluctant relatives into the pews for four consecutive weeks or forfeit the inheritance. Kel Mitchell and Marcello Thedford star in this comedy.
link.title: synopsis
My Big Phat Hip Hop Family
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
Soul Theater Series: The Fabric of a Man
Alonzo Bodden: Tall, Dark and Funny
Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from South Beach
Keepin' the Faith: My Baby's Gettin' Married!
Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right

link.synopsis: When Monica dumps her overbearing boyfriend, Rueben, and becomes engaged to sweet but poor James, her parents disapprove and scheme with Rueben to sabotage the engagement. Meanwhile, James's pals are planning to throw a wild bachelor party that could land the groom in hot water. Can James and Monica navigate interfering relatives and well-meaning friends and actually make it to the altar? Josué Gutierrez and Lyanna Tumaneng star in this comedy.
link.title: synopsis
20th Century Boys: Chapter 2: The Last Hope
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married

link.synopsis: Convinced that Abhi's (Ritesh Deshmukh) new girlfriend, Kartika (Rimi Sen), is only interested in his money, Paglu (Aftab Shivdasani) and Amrita (Ayesha Takia) conspire to save their childhood friend from the clutches of the conniving gold digger. Filmmaker Eshwar Niwas (My Name is Anthony Gonsalves) directs this music-filled romantic comedy that also stars Satish Shah and Saurabh Shukla.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Jimmy Shergill stars in this Bollywood romantic comedy as Neel, an overachieving Columbia student who decides -- against his girlfriend Maya's (Nisha Rawal) protests -- to head up the formation of a new call center in India. When he innocently rebuffs the advances of his new boss, Tanvi (Monishka), Neel inadvertently thrusts himself into a downward spiral that threatens to destroy both his professional life and his relationship with Maya.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Get ready for some rip-roaring classic comedy with this trio of films -- Slapstick, The Clown Princes of Hollywood and The Stolen Jools -- featuring the top comics of a bygone era at their most hilarious. The casts of silver-screen luminaries include Charlie Chaplin, Harold Lloyd, Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy, Joe E. Brown, Norma Shearer, Joan Crawford, Wallace Beery, Buster Keaton, Gary Cooper, Douglas Fairbanks Jr. and more.
link.title: synopsis
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 3
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection 2
When Willie Comes Marching Home / Up the River
The Cheat / Merrily We Go to Hell
Reconstruction: The Second Civil War: American Experience
The Little Tramp: The Charlie Chaplin Collection
Kings of Comedy: Masters of the Silent Screen
Civil War Films of the Silent Era

link.synopsis: Stephen Fry stars as a pompous British RAF officer who's planning to tunnel out of the German POW camp where he and his men are being held -- never mind that he's already escaped, and been recaptured, 23 times already. But this time, when the German guards discover his plan, they demand to escape with the Brits. Adrian Shergold directs this madcap comedy that also stars Nicholas Lyndhurst and Geoffrey Palmer.
link.title: synopsis
Open All Hours: The Complete Series
Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Red Zone Cuba
The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill but Came Down a Mountain

link.synopsis: Determined to defy any authority that stands in his way, Juan Pistolas (Javier Solis) attempts to start a revolution in Mexico. To carry out his crazy scheme, the rowdy rebel looks for opportunities to raise cash quickly and tries stealing weapons from the United States. Mixing elements of action and comedy into a Western, this classic Mexican film was the last movie to star Javier Solis, a popular singer of boleros and rancheras.
link.title: synopsis
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Nosotros Los Pobres
Reader's Digest: Mysteries of the Ancient World
Dios te Bendiga Hijo Mío: Santa Martha Acatitla Penitenciaria
La Muerte del Gallo de Oro
Si Honraras a Tu Coca Madre

link.synopsis: Three high school friends desperate to score see their perfect opportunity when a classmate decides to throw a party. Nothing will stop them from reaching their goal as they try to sweet-talk their love interests at the year's hottest bash. Will they get the hook up or fall flat on their faces? Anthony Marquez, Britton Mizell, Cory King and Marina Reza star in Foster V. Corder's hilarious coming-of-age comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Can You Keep It Up for a Week?
South Pacific: In Concert From Carnegie Hall
The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down
The Night of the White Pants

link.synopsis: George Chakiris (West Side Story) stars in this comedy as AWOL Air Force Col. Larry Curado. Believing he killed a sergeant during his escape, Larry grabs his girlfriend and flees on his brother's motorcycle. On the road, they meet a fellow rider and his girl on an identical bike. After a stop at a café, the women confuse the bikes and end up with the wrong men. Janette Scott and Jackie Lane co-star in this mistaken-identity farce.
link.title: synopsis
Mr. Sardonicus / The Old Dark House
Don't Touch That Dial: TV's Best Commercials
Once Upon a Time in the Midlands
The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
The Hammer Horror Series: Phantom of the Opera / Paranoiac
Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines
A Hard Day's Night: Collector's Series
Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day

link.synopsis: Desperate to immigrate to the United States, Abbas (Akbar Abdi), a young Turkish man, decides to disguise himself as a woman and attempt to dupe an American man into marrying him, thus making him a full-fledged U.S. citizen. Directed by Davoud Mir-Bagheri, this uproarious Iranian comedy about passing as the opposite sex caused quite a stir when released in its native country. Dariush Arjmand and Parviz Parastui also star.
link.title: synopsis
The Day I Became a Woman
Bab'Aziz: The Prince Who Contemplated His Soul
Ahmad Shamlou: Master Poet of Liberty
Under the Skin of the City
Smell of Camphor, Fragrance of Jasmine

link.synopsis: When fresh-from-prison "Pressure" Maxwell's (Edward G. Robinson) plans to walk the straight and narrow are thwarted, he and a pal buy a luggage store in order to tunnel into a neighboring bank. But as the luggage business unexpectedly proves wildly profitable, they abandon their bank-robbing plot -- only to discover that some other crooks have become invested in their scheme. Lloyd Bacon directs this comedy that also stars Broderick Crawford.
link.title: synopsis
I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
Orson Welles: The Stranger/Orson Welles on Film
The Man Who Came to Dinner
Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House

link.synopsis: Drawing on funny experiences of his own life, comic giant Steve Harvey sounds off on family, work and travel in this stand-up set, which he delivers before a packed house in New Jersey. Following up his hit show "Don't Trip … He Ain't Through with Me Yet!" Harvey demonstrates, with his impeccable timing and unstoppable charisma, why he was included in the legendary funnyman foursome "The Original Kings of Comedy."
link.title: synopsis
Steve Harvey: Don't Trip, He Ain't Through with Me Yet
Mo'Nique: I Coulda Been Your Cellmate!
Cedric the Entertainer: Taking You Higher
Robin Harris: Live from the Comedy Act Theater
Shaq & Cedric the Entertainer Present: All Star Comedy Jam
The Best of The Steve Harvey Show
Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from South Beach
The Big Black Comedy Show: Vol. 1
Mike Epps: Under Rated & Never Faded
Why We Laugh: Black Comedians on Black Comedy
Jamie Foxx Unleashed: Lost, Stolen and Leaked!
Dave Chappelle: For What It's Worth
Aisha Tyler Is Lit: Live at the Fillmore
Outlaugh: The Best of Queer Comedy
Frank Caliendo: All Over the Place
Assume the Position with Mr. Wuhl
The Comedians of Comedy: Live at the El Rey
Lewis Black: Red, White and Screwed
Carlos Mencia: Not for the Easily Offended: Live in San Jose
Comedians of Comedy: Live at the Troubadour
Bill Maher: Victory Begins at Home
Anjelah Johnson: That's How We Do It
Gabriel Iglesias: I'm Not Fat ... I'm Fluffy

link.synopsis: Eddie (Richard Anconina) fears for his job in the garment district of Paris when a huge retailing chain tries to move into the neighborhood, threatening the small shops that give the area its classic charm, in this French comedy. But when the new rival tries to pull off a shady deal, Eddie calls on his best friends Dov, Yvan, Patrick and Serge to help him plan a crazy scheme to fend off the competition.
link.title: synopsis
I Do: How to Get Married and Stay Single
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
The Romance of Astrea and Celadon

link.synopsis: Twelve years after graduation, Marina (Marina de Tavira), Adán (Arturo Barba), Mimí (Alejandra Gollas) and Ignacio (Pedro Izquierdo) relive old passions and jealousies at their high school reunion. Together they try to make good on the failed promises of their youth in this high-spirited Mexican romantic comedy. Gollas was nominated for Best Supporting Actress at the 2007 Ariel Awards, Mexico's main national film honors.
link.title: synopsis
A Good Death Beats a Dull Life

link.synopsis: Despite a comfortable life and two teen sons, Juan (Guillermo Francella) and Ana (Lucía Galán) decide it's time to rekindle the fire in their relationship with a zesty trip to the Dominican Republic. But fearful of going alone, they invite Ana's prankster brother, Marito (Marito), and his wife. The dream vacation becomes something of a nightmare, however, when the normally devoted Juan finds himself tempted by a local beauty in this sunny comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Other Side of the Bed
Tyler Perry's I Can Do Bad All by Myself

link.synopsis: Inconsolable after his wife perishes in a freak accident while vacationing in Prague, worrywart British tourist Colin Frampton (Andy Nyman) -- certain he can't live without her -- enlists hard-up Czech Pavel Zeman (Karel Roden) to end his suffering. But when Pavel's increasingly crazy schemes fail to result in Colin's death, the would-be killer's efforts attract the attention of a hulking mob boss (Robert Polo) in this inky Czech comedy.
link.title: synopsis
He Died with a Felafel in His Hand
In Heaven as it is on Earth
The Six Wives of Henry Lefay
Nazi Medicine / The Cross and the Star: Double Feature
The 2005 Academy Award Short Films Collection
The Way I Spent the End of the World

link.synopsis: Sukeban takes after his tough biker father in all but one way: He looks like a sexy schoolgirl. After his appearance gets him expelled from yet another high school, his father dresses him in drag and sends him to an all-girl school. There, Sukeban's new classmates welcome him with humiliation classes, sex-inspired cliques and other bizarre traditions. Demo Tanaka and Kentaro Kishi star in this fetish-laced comedy based on the racy manga series.
link.title: synopsis
The Glamorous Life of Sachiko Hanai
New Manager of the Sumo Club
Attack Girls' Swim Team vs. the Undead

link.synopsis: Jessica devises the perfect experiment to conduct for her women's studies thesis: Four of her sexy friends will swear off sex, dating and even talking to men for 100 days. All goes well until a crafty tycoon launches an experiment of his own. He offers a cool million to the first guy who can break the ladies' celibacy streak. Lala Sloatman, Jeremy Sisto, Bruce Davison, Ethan Embry, Erin Gray and Eve Plumb star in this saucy comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Revenge of the Boarding School Dropouts
How to Make Love to a Woman

link.synopsis: Ring in the season with some holiday truthiness! Stephen Colbert, star of Comedy Central's satirical gem "The Colbert Report" celebrates the glory -- and unyielding commercialism -- of Christmas with this star-studded holiday special. Elvis Costello, John Legend, Feist, Willie Nelson, Toby Keith and Jon Stewart join America's favorite delusional pundit for an evening of yuletide fun and cheer that's sure to tickle your funny bone.
link.title: synopsis
Christmas Unwrapped: The History of Christmas
The Daily Show with Jon Stewart: Indecision 2004
National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation 2: Cousin Eddie's Island Adventure
Comedy Central Salutes George W. Bush
Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
The Brady Bunch in the White House
South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Saturday TV Funhouse
The Best of the Colbert Report
Monty Python's And Now for Something Completely Different

title.regular: A Colbert Christmas: The Greatest Gift of All

link.synopsis: It's Eastern traditionalism vs. Western liberalism in director Amit Devatia's amusing social comedy that centers on the culture clash between a young Westernized Indian (Vipul Vithalani) and his conservative grandfather (Amit Devatia). When he learns that his grandson has impregnated a woman (Swati Shah) whom he doesn't plan to marry, Grandfather sets out to teach the youngster about the pitfalls of impulsive relationships and casual sex.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: When struggling customs officer Kanti (Tiku Talsania) and his wife, Sakshi (Reshma Desai), learn that their 16-year-old son is suffering from a life-threatening heart condition that costs a small fortune to treat, the couple is driven to take desperate measures. Feroz Bhagat directs this wry social comedy that also stars Falguni Dave, Rajesh Mandloi, Sanjay Hiralehar, Astha Naresh Sha and Meera Acharya.
link.title: synopsis
Once Upon a Time in Mumbai

link.synopsis: When Nikhilkumar Timbadiya's wife, Sheela, discovers that her husband has been spending his weekends not balancing spreadsheets at the office but womanizing in Pune and Mumbai, the picturesque life of the nebbish accountant is turned upside down. Arvind Rathod, Sheetal Rajda, Vaishali Parmar, Bijal Mehta, Mahesh Udeshi, Hemant Bhatt and Dharmesh Vyas star in this hilarious comedy from director Suresh Rajda.
link.title: synopsis
Lakhtar Ni Ladi Ne Vilayat No Var
Pachhi Kehta Nahi Ke Kahyun Nahotu

title.regular: Som Thi Shukra Taro, Shaniware Hun Maro
title.short: Som Thi Shukra Taro, Shaniware Hun Maro

link.synopsis: Jack Haley stars in this light musical comedy about rival radio executives trying to convince a big sponsor that they have a hit show on their hands: a program in which contestants engage in goofy antics for big cash prizes. Meanwhile, a romantic entanglement develops between the would-be producers and one of the show's writers. Based on the real-life radio program hosted by Art Linkletter, the film also stars Ozzie Nelson and Helen Walker.
link.title: synopsis
My Sister Eileen / She Wouldn't Say Yes
The Loneliness of the Long Distance Runner
You Can't Take It with You
Take Me Out to the Ball Game
Juke Joint / Reet, Petite and Gone
Rhythm on the Range / Rhythm on the River: Double Feature

link.synopsis: Strapped for cash they need to open a nightclub and mount a comeback, doo-wop singers George (Chazz Palminteri) and Danny (director Robert Davi) persuade their former chart-topping group the Dukes to break into a dental lab and plunder a stash of gold. But when their plan goes awry, the friends discover something more valuable than their dreams of recapturing former glory. Frank D'Amico and Elya Baskin co-star in this music-filled comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Six Wives of Henry Lefay
The Year of Getting to Know Us
Bring It On: All or Nothing

link.synopsis: When his wife unexpectedly dies, the director (Lluís Homar) of an all-male Shakespearean theater troupe finds himself inexplicably attracted to the group's young new actor, Valentín (Inaki Font). As their infatuation with one another grows, another actor's intense jealousy becomes the fuel for a tragedy befitting the very material they are rehearsing for production. Juan Luis Iborra directs this dark comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Other Side of the Bed

link.synopsis: After a jealous rival bumps Charlie (Rupert Everett) off the A-list of Paris' jet set, our humiliated hero journeys to the island of Ibiza and starts planning his comeback with the help of Ibiza's grand poo-bah of partying, John John (José Garcia). Lambert Wilson co-stars as Charlie's trusty pal, Arthus, in this wild romp of a comedy, which is director Fabien Onteniente's sequel to his hit 2000 satire, Jet Set.
link.title: synopsis
Yves St. Laurent: His Life and Times

link.synopsis: A plan to impress the beautiful Kiki with a gift of stolen jewelry backfires for slacker DJ Johnson, who ends up sentenced to 48 hours of house arrest after the stunt goes horribly wrong. Luckily, Kiki was impressed. Unluckily, the cops are keeping a very close watch on the love-struck criminal, and DJ will need the help of all his boys in the hood to help him win Kiki's heart in this hot comedy starring Devon Deshawn Stewart and Mariel Perez.
link.title: synopsis
Keepin' the Faith: Momma's Got a Boyfriend
Dane Cook: Rough Around the Edges: Live from Madison Square Garden
Comics on Duty: We Love You, Mrs. Bevins
Jessica Sinclaire's Confessions of a Lonely Wife
Platinum Comedy Series: Earthquake: About Got Damm Time!
Platinum Comedy Series: Paul Rodriguez: Live in San Quentin
The Boys and Girl from County Clare
Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee

link.synopsis: Frank Borzage's 1929 comedy stars Will Rogers as Pike Peters, a mechanic who gets an unexpected windfall from an oil field, prompting his wife to drag the family to Paris in search of a culture befitting their newfound status. Soon, Pike and his family begin attracting a variety of French admirers, creating a slew of hilarious encounters between this simple Oklahoma family and the unsuspecting French aristocracy.
link.title: synopsis
Will Rogers Collection: In Old Kentucky
Will Rogers Collection: Life Begins at Forty
Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
Other Men's Women / The Purchase Price
The Mechanical Man / The Headless Horseman
Brigitte and Brigitte / Up and Down: The Films of Luc Moullet
The Complete Jean Vigo: À Propos de Nice / Taris / Zero de Conduite / L'Atalante
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 3
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
Foolish Wives / The Man You Loved to Hate

link.synopsis: Nostalgia buffs and fans of the beloved Our Gang series will relish this fully restored and remastered collection of 80 theatrical comedy shorts spanning the years 1929 to 1938. As always, lovable mischief makers Spanky, Darla, Alfalfa, Buckwheat and Froggy land in one predicament after another. The array of extras includes several featurettes, commentary by film historians and interviews with former Little Rascals.
link.title: synopsis
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 1
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 2
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 3
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 4
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 5
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 6
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 7
The Little Rascals: The Complete Series: Disc 8
The Little Rascals: Collector's Edition III
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Around the World in 80 Days: Special Edition
Disney Princess Stories: Vol. 1: A Gift From the Heart
Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part II
The True Story of Puss 'n Boots

title.regular: The Little Rascals: The Complete Series
title.short: The Little Rascals: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: When Martha (Ana Serradilla) catches her longtime boyfriend cheating on her, she dumps him, signs up with an Internet dating service, and begins lustily enjoying the benefits of being young, beautiful and single. But when she finally meets a man who could be Mr. Right, she has to decide whether she is ready to risk love once again. Jorge Colon directs this romantic comedy that also stars Carlos de la Mota and Miguel Rodarte.
link.title: synopsis
A Good Death Beats a Dull Life

link.synopsis: Written and directed by indie filmmaker Cullen Hoback, this high-concept comedy centers on the exploits of eight mental hospital patients who awaken to discover that they've just slept through the apocalypse. Determined to find the edge of the world, the former residents of Lost Acres load into a short, yellow bus and embark upon a cross-country journey to rescue potential survivors and plant the seeds for a new society, fashioned to their liking.
link.title: synopsis
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee
Dave Barry's Complete Guide to Guys
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date
Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail

link.synopsis: Inspired by the 1980s comedy hits Teen Wolf and Ski School, this low-budget spoof centers on a group of ski bums who are forced to momentarily set their non-stop partying ways aside to save their favorite ski resort from a hostile takeover. Packed with mischief, mayhem and moon-worshipping werewolves, this hilarious B-movie stars Casey Bowker, cult film legend Trent Haaga and adult film star Alix Lakehurst.
link.title: synopsis
Zombies / The Blood Seekers / Blood Stalkers
Angels / Getting into Heaven: Double Feature
Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
Citizen Toxie: The Toxic Avenger IV
Mulva: Zombie Ass Kicker! / Filthy McNasty

link.synopsis: Expelled from med school after rigging a cadaver with remote-control genitalia, pals Gavin (Ross Kelly) and Curt (Matt Sanford) stumble into the middle of a mafia-run kidney harvest ring. While trying to expose the ring to the doctor who kicked them out of school, our heroes are coerced by Hector the Plunger (Miguel Martinez) and his henchmen, Tiny and Bobo, to perform the kidney surgeries themselves in this bloody-good black comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date
Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee
Dave Barry's Complete Guide to Guys

link.synopsis: When Bob's (Adrian Martinez) new girlfriend, Mona (Kristen Lewis), meets his old friend and new roommate, 30-something Eric (Alexander Lyras), sparks fly. Now, Bob and Eric have a big problem, and they have to decide if their friendship is worth more than love with a 20-something blonde beauty. Alan Kirschen directs this film festival award-winning romantic comedy that also stars Adrian Martinez and Neal Jones.
link.title: synopsis
Loretta LaRoche: Life Is Short, Wear Your Party Pants

link.synopsis: Facing perpetual financial difficulties, Sri Lankan fruit seller Stanley (Dharmapriya Dias) schemes to move west and start a new life by forming a handball team with friends and family members for an upcoming international competition in Bavaria. None of them knows how to play, but they plan to disappear into Germany as soon as they arrive in the country. Uberto Pasolini directs this entertaining comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
Bring It On: In It to Win It
The Boys and Girl from County Clare
Bring It On: All or Nothing
On Any Sunday: Motocross, Malcolm and More
